DataElement.preferredDefinition: The sum of diameter of the target lesions measured in millimeters.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An object fixed as a goal or point of examination; something to point at; a destination._A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part._The final aggregate amount._The length of a straight line passing through the center of a circle or sphere and connecting two points on the circumference.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The goal intended to be attained.:(LEE-zhun) An area of abnormal tissue change.

Concepts.definition: An object fixed as a goal or point of examination; something to point at; a destination.
A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A selection of axial measurements of a lesion for protocol eligiblity.

PermissibleValues.value: Greater than or equal to 100 mm
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Greater Than or Equal To One Hundred Millimeter

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Greater Than or Equal To One Hundred Millimeter
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.: A natural number greater than ninety-nine and less than one hundred-one and the quantity that it denotes.: A metric unit of length equal to one thousandth of a meter (10E-3 meter) or approximately 0.03937 inch.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.
A natural number greater than ninety-nine and less than one hundred-one and the quantity that it denotes.
A metric unit of length equal to one thousandth of a meter (10E-3 meter) or approximately 0.03937 inch.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.: A natural number greater than ninety-nine and less than one hundred-one and the quantity that it denotes.: A metric unit of length equal to one thousandth of a meter (10E-3 meter) or approximately 0.03937 inch.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: any measurements, including linear dimensions, volume, and weight, of a patient's tumor.
